data.name: Shady Knight
data.detailed_description:
Join me on Discord


About the Game

Shady Knight is a first-person melee action full of dynamic interactive fights and fluid platforming. You'll climb high towers tearing your enemies apart, kicking them on spikes and fire, jumping from their heads, nailing them to the walls with swords and arrows in freestyle close combats.

Key Features:


  • Everything is a weapon. Throw barrels at your enemies, kick them on spikes and breakable stuff, slam against the walls, slide jump on them to bash with all your speed.
  • Master of sword fights and archery. You can juggle enemies mid-air by slashing, crush them with an overhead chop, knockdown with a perfectly timed parry, shoot rapidly from a bow in a slide, or set your arrows on fire. Nothing feels better than kicking a dropped sword mid-air right into the enemy.
  • Fluid and fun platforming with many ways to traverse the towers. You’ll slide, climb, swing on chains, bounce on enemies' heads, ride zip lines. Learn the basics, practice and you’ll be able to move across the maps quickly and effortlessly.
  • Style beats efficiency! Your goal is to become the most frightening knight. That means the Style Rank that you will get depends on all the variety of different moves that you’ve used, instead of simply counting your kills.
  • Face the towers. Your skills will be tested on short and highly replayable towers that will challenge you with different fight scenarios and quick platforming bits between fights.

data.short_description: Experience interactive fast-paced sword fights mixed with acrobatic archery and fluid platforming from a first-person perspective. Take on the challenge to become the most frighteningly stylish and masterful knight of the age.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 x64
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
